discussion.p: There is no reason for the offsetof macro to invoke potentially throwing operations, so the result of noexcept(offsetof(type,member-designator)) should be true.
discussion.note: Resolved in Rapperswil by a motion to directly apply the words from the ballot comment in N3102.

p.ins: No operation invoked by the offsetof macro shall throw an exception, and noexcept(offsetof(type,member-designator)) shall be true.
